summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a grant agreement with the Washington State Department of Ecology for the City's Combined Sewer Overflow Program and acceptance of grant funds; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1989 Budget of the Engineering Department; adding the Diagonal Avenue South Combined Sewer Overflow control project to the Drainage and Wastewater Capital Improvement Program; authorizing consultant contracts and making appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating Fund and the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
